Jeongkyun

5'11" (180 cm)

Group (2014-2019):
BIGFLO until Jan 17, 2019

Introduction

Jeongkyun is a South Korean singer, producer, and CEO. He is a member of the upcoming group WE:A and was a member of BIGFLO and N-Train.

He made his Japanese solo debut on March 16, 2016, with the mini album Jungkyun 1st Mini Unfinished.

On August 4th, 2024 he announced his marriage to his long-time girlfriend Jung Joohee
